entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 08:35 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this morning then light near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
